markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hauling](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1372)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 80

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_Hauling_ weapons are adept at moving creatures around the battlefield after a successful attack.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> Command;  **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** You succeed at an attack roll to Strike with a weapon with the _hauling_ rune;  **Effect** The target must succeed at a DC 20 Reflex save or be moved 5 feet in a direction you choose. This is [forced movement](/Rules.aspx?ID=451).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Hauling
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 80

**Price** 225 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Hauling (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 80

**Price** 1,300 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The DC is 28, and the target is moved up to 10 feet.
name: Hauling
